author: lundblad
msg: Get rid of an svn_io_check_path (stat) call when reading property files.
This reduces the number of system calls on Linux by about 7 % when running
"svn status" in a Subversion working copy checked out from trunk.  The
speed improvement is minimal, but measurable.  This might be different
props file, ignoring the "does not exist" errors instead of checking

author: pburba
msg: Port of svn propdel, propget, propset, and proplist via file:/// for OS/400.
svn propedit is disabled on the iSeries since external editors are not
currently supported in the ebcdic port.
When setting a property value on the command line with propset, the propval is
interpreted as utf-8 regardless of the propname.  If -F file is used to for the
propval, the file must be encoded in utf-8 for svn:* propnames, regardless of
The --encoding option for svn propset is disabled as we have no plans to
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Disable svn propedit and --encoding option for svn
(svn_cl__propdel): Use SVN_CMDLINE_PRINTF2 rather than svn_cmdline_printf to
output ebcdic from utf-8 var args.  svn_error_createf requires utf-8 var args.
(svn_cl__print_prop_hash): Even if a prop name doesn't start with
svn:*, if its propval is valid utf-8, convert the propval to ebcdic before
(svn_cl__propset): Translate svn:* propvals coming from a file to ensure
consistent line endings.  Use SVN_CMDLINE_FPRINTF2.  svn_error_createf
requires utf-8 var args.  Use svn_cmdline_printf_ebcdic2 explicitly rather
than SVN_CMDLINE_FPRINTF2 where the macro won't work.
SVN_KEYWORD_URL_SHORT, SVN_KEYWORD_ID): Hex escape with ascii values.

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r15051, based on feedback from Julian Foad.
svn_ra_dav__request_dispatch(), to avoid a problem whereby some
compilers can't handle a preprocessor conditional in a macro call.
(simple_request): For the same reason, don't use SVN_ERR.  But here
we can just return the value of the last call directly, which is

author: pburba
msg: Some minor bug fixes for the ebcdic port.
Fix encoding on some svn blame and svnadmin error messages which go to stderr
New substitution macro for svn_cmdline_fprintf that outputs ebcdic from utf-8
Fix pattern matching bug with svn:ignore introduced in r14846.
